thread.title: Great location with great service!
thread.title_full: Great location with great service! - Review of Hotel 32 32, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mgabay99
title: Great location with great service!
text: I stayed at Hotel 3232 for an extended business trip. The room was clean and very spacious. All I needed was available to me including a mini kitchen. It was extremely cold outside, but I didn't even need to turn on the heat to feel comfortable in the room. The staff was courteous and very helpful at all times. Special thanks to Luis, Argenes, and David. I highly recommend and look forward to my next stay
